Sun, 15 Oct 2023 06:00:32 +0000 Elon Musk has celebrated National's election win online. Photo/Susan Walsh/AP
Did the pollsters get it right in the 2023 election? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/did-the-pollsters-get-it-right-in-election-2023/CLZMOEYHO5DNNKJQQBRYLVPX7Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/did-the-pollsters-get-it-right-in-election-2023/CLZMOEYHO5DNNKJQQBRYLVPX7Q/ Alex SpenceRecent polls were broadly accurate on party shares. The surprise was in the electorates. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 06:00:00 +0000 National's party vote share was slightly higher than recent polls indiciated. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Weather: Strong wind gusts over 110km/h cancel six flights in and out of Wellington Airport https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-strong-wind-gusts-over-110kmh-cancel-six-flights-in-and-out-of-wellington-airport/OPW6MIV3C5EVNB3TZU57WR75LI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-strong-wind-gusts-over-110kmh-cancel-six-flights-in-and-out-of-wellington-airport/OPW6MIV3C5EVNB3TZU57WR75LI/ Benjamin PlummerYesterday, strong winds also affected flights in and out of Christchurch Airport. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:31:53 +0000 Six flights in and out of Wellington Airport have been cancelled today due to strong winds. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Mongrel Mob, Black Power tensions flare in Gisborne: New police operation Medial launched to keep community safe https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-black-power-tensions-flare-in-gisborne-new-police-operation-medial-launched-to-keep-community-safe/KIGQBR3LGBBCXKRMNTQ7QL5VL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-black-power-tensions-flare-in-gisborne-new-police-operation-medial-launched-to-keep-community-safe/KIGQBR3LGBBCXKRMNTQ7QL5VL4/ Raphael FranksOperation Medial lead Inspector Darren Paki mentioned recent drive-by shootings. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:04:53 +0000 On Friday evening, police got several calls reporting shootings in Gisborne, which allowed police to respond quickly and be prepared with information, Inspector Paki said - something he wanted more of from the new operation.

Simon Wilson: The Labour collapse - fit for the war but not for the peace https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/simon-wilson-the-labour-collapse-fit-for-the-war-but-not-for-the-peace/ETSGLL7JAVBAHAVZZOXRGD4YZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/simon-wilson-the-labour-collapse-fit-for-the-war-but-not-for-the-peace/ETSGLL7JAVBAHAVZZOXRGD4YZ4/ Simon WilsonOPINION: Labour won the pandemic war, but did not know how to win the peace that followed.
